Clotho can convert construction files conforming to the wet lab syntax into Construction Files you can simulate. Additional metadata easily can be added in Clotho.

You can specify sequences (like primer1) directly in the construction file, or reference sequences stored in Clotho (like pPROBE_GFP or pUC19).

As you run the simulation, terms will be colored as they are defined.

Try editing the wet lab construction file below, and the interface will update in realtime.
